about.description: This is a collection of open-source audio plugins.
about.license: Licensed under the terms of GNU Lesser Public License v3 (LGPLv3):

file.confirm_load: Do you really want to load the selected file?
file.confirm_overwrite: The selected file already exists. Overwrite?
file.invalid_name: The entered file name is not valid
file.not_exists: The selected file does not exist
file.not_specified: The file name is not specified

greetings.0: You've just updated plugins to version {@meta_pkg_version}!
greetings.1: The '{@meta_pkg_full_name}' is non-commercial project and needs financial support for the further development.
greetings.2: You may help the open source collection of plugins to grow by visiting the following link and submitting donations to the project:
greetings.3: Remember that subscription and regular small donations will give more benefits to the project than one-time donations.
greetings.5: According to sanctions against Russian Federation, any foreign currency payments are blocked.
greetings.6: The project accepts cryptocurrency dontations only. We hope that all other type of donations will be back soon.
greetings.7: The LSP Plugins Project is speaking out against any armored conflicts.
greetings.8: To not to be very annoying, this dialog will be shown only after each version update of plugins.
